content.full_text:
Survey of Albany, Illinois, 16 June 18361 Explanation Head of Map Due NorthWidth of Streets 66 feetWDoth"fAlleys 16fedoFront of LotsAl66fedoDepthofdoAl124WdoStone at the S. W. corner of the Public square.Blocks Nos. 1, 2, 3 4, 5, and the Public Square are situated on the West half of

the S E quater of Section 6, and are the property ofJohn Wright. Blocks 6 and 7 are situated on the West half of the N. E quarter of Section 7,bothand are the property ofJohn Donaven. Both tracts are of Township 19 North of Range 3 West. I hereby certify that the above is a correct Map of the town ofAlbany, as surveyed by me

Both tracts are of Township 19 North of Range 3 West. I hereby certify that the above is a correct Map of the town ofAlbany, as surveyed by me

structured_content.text:
Head of Map Due NorthWidth of Streets 66 feetWDo[ditto]th"fAlleys 16fedoFront of LotsAl66fedoDepthofdoAl124WdoStone at the S. W.[Southwest] corner of the Public square.Blocks Nos. 1, 2, 3  4, 5, and the Public Square are situated on the West half of
               the S E[Southeast] quater of Section 6, and are the property ofJohn Wright.  Blocks 6 and 7 are situated on the West half of the N.  E[Northeast] quarter of Section 7,bothand are the property ofJohn Donaven.  Both tracts are of Township 19 North of Range 3 West.
I hereby certify that the above is a correct Map of the town ofAlbany, as surveyed by me
